plaintext.name: net address set $1 on $2;
plaintext.pi: echo program install; echo pi $program= $1 $server= $2; program install $1 on $2;
plaintext.ps: echo program start; echo ps $program= $1 $server= $2; program start $1 on $2;
plaintext.pstop: echo program stop; echo pstop $program= $1 $server= $2; program stop $1 on $2;
plaintext.pv: echo program view; program view running on $1;
plaintext.setup_dhcp: echo setup_dhcp $floor= $1 $hwid= $2 $dns= $3; net address set $1/dhcp on $2; program install dnsmasq on $1/dhcp; program start dnsmasq on $1/dhcp; dhcp option dns $3 on $1/dhcp; dhcp option prefix $1/ on $1/dhcp;
plaintext.setup_firewall: echo setup_firewall $hwid= $1 $name= $2; net address set $2 on $1; firewall clear on $2; firewall allow tcp/23 on $2; firewall allow udp/53 on $2; firewall allow udp/69 on $2; firewall allow tcp/80 on $2; firewall allow tcp/443 on $2; firewall allow udp/520 on $2; firewall allow udp/554 on $2; firewall allow udp/5060 on $2; firewall allow tcp/3306 on $2; firewall allow tcp/8333 on $2; firewall default deny on $2;
